statements: DELETE FROM budget_tracking WHERE department_name = 'Marketing' AND expenditure > 1000
DELETE FROM BudgetAllocations WHERE id = 100 AND name = 'Office Supplies';
DELETE FROM Expenditures WHERE amount > 5000 OR (name = 'Marketing' AND description LIKE '%car%');
DELETE FROM BudgetAllocations WHERE department_id = 101 AND allocation_amount > 5000;
DELETE FROM Expenditures WHERE expenditure_amount < 1000 AND department_id = 201;
DELETE FROM allocations WHERE department_name = 'IT' AND budget_amount < 5000;
DELETE FROM expenditures WHERE expense_date < '2022-01-01' AND department_name = 'HR';
